abstrac: Increase organic website traffic and enhance your business web presence
bio:
Top-Rated Plus Freelancer

My name is Mehar Muhammad Kashif and I’m a Social Media Strategist and Digital Marketing Specialist With over 11 years of experience in the E-Commerce field, I’ve become obsessed with social media and technology!

I take entrepreneurs step by step through the process to engage, grow, and profit with social media tools. As a Social Media Strategist for small business owners, I provide you with the guidance and tools you need to succeed.

You need a social media geek on your team. I’m that geek. I provide innovative social media strategies and services designed to give your business a strong online presence; increasing your exposure and bottom line profits. I am devoted to high standards of social media for branding and advertising purposes, and look forward to helping you create your own Power brand!

Thinking outside the box, building innovative campaigns, and never losing focus are probably the most commonly-used descriptions you’ll hear when someone describes me and my company. Among my many core competencies, growth strategy development is by and large my biggest strength, as it encompasses a whole suite of skills that not only boost a client’s profile and revenue. These include around-the-clock competitor analysis, new media, and technology strategies, monitoring target markets, and keeping KPIs synchronized in order to stay a cut above the competition.

As a marketing expert I primarily focus on:

- Growth Hacking
- Social Selling
- Lead Generation
- Organic Growth

The service I provide will position you as the subject matter expert and thought leader in your field, build trust with your clients, and educate them in your space.

Are you looking for a professional social media manager?

Welcome to my "Guru" Profile. Present Time social media is the right place to start and grow your business. More important than that is managing Social-Media with the right and professional marketing manager. I am working professionally in The SMM with 11+ years of experience


✔️ Benefits of Good Social Media Marketing Manager in Business


👉 Cost-effective

👉 Increased traffic

👉 Customer satisfaction

👉 Engage with your customers 

👉 Improved brand loyalty & awareness



✔️ My Services For Your Business



Account Create & Optimize
Page Setup & Page Optimization
Schedule Relevant Daily Posts
Creative Post Design and Infographics by Canva & Photoshop
Research Trending Hashtags According to Your Niche
Increase Your Online Presence
Grow Followers Totally Organically
Divert Traffic to The Website
FB and Google Ads (Custom Bill)
Increase Engagement With 100% Real and Organic Profiles
Build Community *Brand Awareness *Potential Customers

✔️ SM Platform:


Facebook
Instagram
Twitter
Pinterest
LinkedIn
YouTube
Google Business

I am flexible and available to answer questions, have meetings, provide assistance, and make your life easier by taking care of your social media. I have been a leading provider of Digital Marketing Services since 2011, so you can be sure you are safe.

For additional questions, lets connect and take your business to the next level.

abstrac: The right writer, editor, photographer or developer for your project.
bio:
I'm a native US English author and editor with over 30 years of experience in writing for print and for electronic publication. My work has been published in national trade magazines as well as internationally. If you need powerful, expertly written content, let my experience and creativity work for you.

I am also a photographer/photo editor, with extensive experience in film and digital photography as well as darkroom and editing experience. I'm proficient with both Photoshop and Lightroom.

I also operate a successful web developing, programming and hosting business. My proficiencies in a number of web technologies, programming languages, content management systems and database integration are an important asset.

All in all, I've been self-employed for over 30 years, with a strong background in industrial and technological trades. As you might have guessed from this bio, I'm no spring chicken. That means you can count on a mature, responsible attitude when we work together.

I prefer to work through Guru.com's escrow system for initial projects with new clients. After a working relationship is established, other methods are fine.

I prefer email or the Guru message board for communication, as these methods provide both parties with documentation to refer to. I'm happy to introduce myself via Skype for those who like to make sure they're talking with a real person.

For extensive projects, I may require a deposit. This is always refundable if the finished project doesn't meet the client's expectations.
